package com.org.gen.day2HandsOn;

public class ques4 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        String arr[]= {"Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"};
	    for(int i=0;i<7;i++)
	    {
	    	System.out.println(arr[i]);
	    }
	}

}
